Articles.Content:
Hello everyone^^

I trying to write a cfg file now.But I want to make my engine have thrust curve. Is it possible?
First you have to tell us what you mean by "thrust curve". :]

> 
> First you have to tell us what you mean by "thrust curve". :]

It similar to atmosphere curve(that use in ISP change by change the atmosphere pressure ). I want to know that this function can work with thrust ?

> 
> It similar to atmosphere curve(that use in ISP change by change the atmosphere pressure ). I want to know that this function can work with thrust ?

Yes, atmospheric engines have one, take a look at their configs.

You mean you want thrust to increase or decreased based on atmospheric pressure? That will take a mod.

Or do you mean you want thrust to change with velocity? That one, KSP already has, as Chris points out.
